meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lena Liberman Jace Cochran Abigail Myers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7502.

td.p: Lena Liberman, a content editor from Baltimore, Maryland
Jace Cochran, a municipal judge from Dayton, Tennessee
Abigail Myers, an education administrator from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,000)

tr.td: WHEN IN DOME
QUOTATIONS
TURKISH DELIGHTS
EPONYMS
MEDICAL CENTER
CHEESY ANAGRAMS
